name: Pico-feldspar
tagline: An EDSL in Haskell generating C code. It is made to be a very small subset of Feldspar with the addition of the experimental features like bidirectionality of the generated expressions.
body: An EDSL in Haskell generating C code. It is made to be a very small subset of [Feldspar](https://github.com/Feldspar) with the addition of the experimental features like bidirectionality of the generated expressions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
